mapper.select: SELECT * FROM nft_data WHERE nft_id LIKE '%' || #{nftId} || '%'

SELECT t.id FROM transactions_nipanft t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ib.* FROM blocks ib LEFT JOIN channel c ON c.channel_genesis_hash = ib.channel_genesis_hash WHERE c.name='digitalzonenipanft' )b ON t.blockid = b.blocknum LEFT JOIN channel c ON c.channel_genesis_hash = t.channel_genesis_hash WHERE c.name='digitalzonenipanft' ORDER BY t.id desc LIMIT 1

SELECT t.nft_id FROM transactions_nipanft t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ib.* FROM blocks ib LEFT JOIN channel c ON c.channel_genesis_hash = ib.channel_genesis_hash WHERE c.name='digitalzonenipanft' )b ON t.blockid = b.blocknum LEFT JOIN channel c ON c.channel_genesis_hash = t.channel_genesis_hash WHERE c.name='digitalzonenipanft' AND nft_num=#{nftNum}

SELECT t.id, TO_CHAR(t.createdt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') AS createdt, t.txhash, t.timestamp, t.blockid FROM transactions_nipanft t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ib.* FROM blocks ib LEFT JOIN channel c ON c.channel_genesis_hash = ib.channel_genesis_hash WHERE c.name='digitalzonenipanft' )b ON t.blockid = b.blocknum LEFT JOIN channel c ON c.channel_genesis_hash = t.channel_genesis_hash WHERE c.name='digitalzonenipanft' ORDER BY t.id DESC LIMIT 9
SELECT TO_CHAR(t.inserted_at, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') AS insertedAt, t.block_number, t.hash FROM transactions t ORDER BY t.inserted_at DESC LIMIT 9
SELECT t.block_number AS blockNumber, t.hash AS hash, TO_CHAR(t.inserted_at + interval '9 hours', 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') AS insertedAt FROM transactions t WHERE t.block_number=#{blocknum}

SELECT t.block_number AS blockNumber, t.hash, TO_CHAR(t.inserted_at + interval '9 hours', 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') AS insertedAt -- t.nft_id, -- t.title, -- t.timestamp, -- nd.nft_num, -- nd.detail_num, -- t.nft_status FROM transactions t WHERE encode(t.hash, 'hex') = substring(#{trId} FROM 3)

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transactions_nipanft t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ib.* FROM blocks ib LEFT JOIN channel c ON c.channel_genesis_hash = ib.channel_genesis_hash WHERE c.name='digitalzonenipanft' )b ON t.blockid = b.blocknum LEFT JOIN channel c ON c.channel_genesis_hash = t.channel_genesis_hash JOIN nft_data nd ON t.nft_id = nd.nft_id WHERE c.name='digitalzonenipanft' AND t.fcn='Read_NFT' AND nd.hide_yn = 'N' AND nd.del_yn = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transactions WHERE encode(input::bytea, 'hex') LIKE '%fd216f3%'

SELECT t.block_number AS blockNumber, t.hash AS hash, TO_CHAR(t.inserted_at + interval '9 hours', 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') AS insertedAt FROM transactions t ORDER BY t.block_number DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET (#{pageNum}-1)*10

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transactions_nipanft t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ib.* FROM blocks ib LEFT JOIN channel c ON c.channel_genesis_hash = ib.channel_genesis_hash WHERE c.name='digitalzonenipanft' )b ON t.blockid = b.blocknum LEFT JOIN channel c ON c.channel_genesis_hash = t.channel_genesis_hash WHERE c.name='digitalzonenipanft' AND t.txhash = #{searchWord}

SELECT t.id FROM transactions_nipanft t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ib.* FROM blocks ib LEFT JOIN channel c ON c.channel_genesis_hash = ib.channel_genesis_hash WHERE c.name='digitalzonenipanft' )b ON t.blockid = b.blocknum LEFT JOIN channel c ON c.channel_genesis_hash = t.channel_genesis_hash WHERE c.name='digitalzonenipanft' AND t.txhash = #{searchWord}

SELECT COUNT(t.*) FROM transactions_nipanft t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ib.* FROM blocks ib LEFT JOIN channel c ON c.channel_genesis_hash = ib.channel_genesis_hash WHERE c.name='digitalzonenipanft' )b ON t.blockid = b.blocknum WHERE t.nft_id = #{nftId} AND t.fcn='Read_NFT'
